Summary: I was watching the stars and it was where I was looking
divs: sighting detailsi was at home watching the stars and seen a misty blue orb and i dont know what it was so i just watched to see if i would see it again. it only lasted about 1 1\2 - 2 secand it was gone. it went in a strait line and in a ne. direction. i will do another report because i seen unexplained lights about 2 nights before . i hope some one can tell me what i seen.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Beach City
There was one other sighting in Beach City on or around August 3rd 2013
